org.apache.river.qa.harness

Interface LegacyTest

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Test, TestEnvironment
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractConnectionTest, AbstractEndpointTest, AbstractMuxTest, AbstractThreadTest, AbstractTrustVerifierTest, AbstractTrustVerifierTestKerberos, AbstractTrustVerifierTestSSL, BJEAbstractTest, CheckConstraintsTest, CheckTrustEquivalenceTest, ClientAbortTest, ClientFlowControlTest, CloseTest, ConnectionManagerTest, ConstructorAccessorTest, ConstructorTest, DiscoveryV2CachingTest, Driver, EndpointInUseTest, EqualityTest, ExportExceptionTest_NullArgument, ExportExceptionTest_SameIDSameSE, ExportTest_CallTwice, ExportTest_CustomParams, ExportTest_DefaultParams, GetDeliveryStatusTest, IllegalArgumentExceptionTest, IsTrustedObjectKerberos, IsTrustedObjectTest, IsTrustedObjectTestSSL, KerberosCheckTrustEquivalenceTest, KerberosConstructorAccessorTest, KerberosServerConstructorAccessorTest, KerberosWrapper, ListenContextExceptionTest, MultihomedClientTest, MuxClientTest, MuxServerTest, NewRequestConflictingConstraintsTest, NullPointerExceptionTest, RobustnessTest, ServerAbortTest, ServerConnectionManagerTest, ServerConstructorAccessorTest, ServerEndpointTest, ServerFlowControlTest, SslServerConstructorAccessorTest, TaskManagerTaskExceptionTest, ToStringTest, UnexportExceptionTest, UnexportTest_ForceFalse, UnexportTest_ForceTrue, UnexportTest_InProgressForceFalse, UnexportTest_InProgressForceTrue, WakeupManagerTaskExceptionTest

    public interface LegacyTest
extends TestEnvironment, Test
    This interface must implemented by all tests supported by the test harness. The following sequence of events is performed for each test:

    • the test class is instantiated and it's no-arg constructor called. The constructor will typically perform minimal initialization, since the test does not have access to the test environment
    • the construct method is called, passing the config object. This provides an opportunity for performing any test setup that relies on accessing configuration parameters.
    • the run method is called to run the test
    • the teardown method is called to clean up state or services created by the test. This method is called even if setup or run throws an exception.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface org.apache.river.qa.harness.Test

        ENV, INDEF, PASSED, RERUN, SKIP, TEST, UNKNOWN

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.apache.river.qa.harness.TestEnvironment

      • Methods inherited from interface org.apache.river.qa.harness.Test
